name: Counter Attack
description: A swift riposte following a successful parry. Exploits the attacker's recovery phase for a lightning-fast counter-strike.

windUp.description: Lightning-fast preparation, weapon already in position from parry

impact.description: Counter-strike lands while attacker is still recovering

costs.notes: High focus cost represents the mental clarity needed to execute counter while under pressure

requirements.description: Can only be used after successfully parrying an attack. Must be initiated within the 200ms counter window.

telegraphs.description: Weapon redirects from parry position toward attacker
Body weight shifts toward attacker, exploiting their extended position

damage.notes: In prototype: 1 clean hit = death. Counter is very fast but attacker is still in recovery, making defense difficult.

specialProperties.description: Attacker is still in recovery phase from their attack, making them vulnerable. However, telegraphs are still visible and can be read.

metadata.notes: Rewards successful parry with opportunity for immediate counter. Requires good focus management. Master parry timing to unlock counter opportunities.
